text: Théodore-Augustin Forcade (1816-1885) was a French Roman Catholic archbishop. ==Early life== Théodore-Augustin Forcade was born on March 2, 1816 in Versailles near Paris.Théodore-Augustin Forcade, Bibliothèque nationale de France ==Vocation== Escutcheon. Forcade was ordained priest at the Paris Foreign Missions Society in 1839. He served as the Apostolic Vicar of Japan from 1846 to 1852Claire Lesegretain, Au Japon, 150e anniversaire de la découverte des « chrétiens cachés », La Croix, March 13, 2015, as the Pro- Prefect Apostolic of Hong Kong from 1847, as the Bishop of Basse Terre from 1853 to 1860, and as the Bishop of Nevers from 1860 to 1873. He served as the Archbishop of Aix-en-Provence from 1873 to 1885. ==Death== He died on September 12, 1885 in Aix-en-Provence. ==References== Category:1816 births Category:1885 deaths Category:People from Versailles Category:People from Aix- en-Provence Category:French Roman Catholic missionaries Category:French Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Théodore-Augustin Forcade
